entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 03 March 2023
